name: @holyfata/cls
description: A zero-dependency utility for joining class names. Supports strings, numbers, booleans, objects, arrays, and more. Intelligently merges various types of arguments into a single className string, ideal for use in React, Vue, and other frontend frameworks. Features conditional class names via object key-value pairs, nested arrays, and custom toString methods. Simple and efficient API for modern frontend projects.

scripts.release: bun run test && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
